text: Nikole Sheri Hannah-Jones (born April 9, 1976) is an American journalist. She is known for her coverage of civil rights in the United States. In April 2015, she became a staff writer for The New York Times. In 2020, she won a Pulitzer Prize for her work on The 1619 Project. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:American political commentators Category:Journalists from Iowa Category:People from Waterloo, Iowa
title: Nikole Hannah-Jones
